description: Try our easy to follow Herb & Garlic Sweet Potato Stacks recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Vegetable stack,Pescatarian,Roast,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Video,Dec 2019,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Sweet potato,Peanut free
name: Herb & Garlic Sweet Potato Stacks Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 220Â°C. Line a roasting pan with baking paper.
Combine butter, oil, thyme and garlic in a large bowl. Season well and whisk with a fork. Slice sweet potatoes into 2mm-thick rounds, add to bowl and toss to lightly coat.
Stack potato slices into 6 piles, inserting a toothpick to secure in place. Place into pan. Bake for 25 minutes or until potato is tender and edges are golden brown.
Scatter over half the parmesan and top with sage. Bake for a further 10 minutes or until tops have browned and sage is crisp. Remove toothpicks, scatter over remaining parmesan and serve.
